name: flickr.photosets.getList
description: Returns the photosets belonging to the specified user.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: user_id
arguments.description: The NSID of the user to get a photoset list for. If none is specified, the calling user is assumed.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to get. Currently, if this is not provided, all sets are returned, but this behaviour may change in future.

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: The number of sets to get per page. If paging is enabled, the maximum number of sets per page is 500.

arguments.name: primary_photo_extras
arguments.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for the primary photo. Currently supported fields are: license, date_upload, date_taken, owner_name, icon_server, original_format, last_update, geo, tags, machine_tags, o_dims, views, media, path_alias, url_sq, url_t, url_s, url_m, url_o

arguments.name: photo_ids
arguments.description: A comma-separated list of photo ids. If specified, each returned set will include a list of these photo ids that are present in the set as "has_requested_photos"

arguments.name: sort_groups
arguments.description: A comma-separated list of groups used to sort the output sets. If has_photo is present, any of the calling user's galleries containing photos referred to in photo_ids will be returned before other galleries. The order of the sort_groups will dictate the order that the groups are returned in. Only available if continuation is used. The resulting output will include a "sort_group" parameter indicating the sort_group that each set is part of, or null if not applicable

response:
<photosets page="1" pages="1" perpage="30" total="2" cancreate="1">
  <photoset id="72157626216528324" primary="5504567858" secret="017804c585" server="5174" farm="6" photos="22" videos="0" count_views="137" count_comments="0" can_comment="1" date_create="1299514498" date_update="1300335009">
    <title>Avis Blanche</title>
    <description>My Grandma's Recipe File.</description>
  </photoset>
  <photoset id="72157624618609504" primary="4847770787" secret="6abd09a292" server="4153" farm="5" photos="43" videos="12" count_views="523" count_comments="1" can_comment="1" date_create="1280530593" date_update="1308091378">
    <title>Mah Kittehs</title>
    <description>Sixty and Niner. Born on the 3rd of May, 2010, or thereabouts. Came to my place on Thursday, July 29, 2010.</description>
  </photoset>
</photosets>

errors.title: User not foundThe user NSID passed was not a valid user NSID and the calling user was not logged in.
Continuation key is invalid or expiredThe continuation key passed was not valid or has already expired.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
